code: import React from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InvoiceList=_ref=>{let{invoices,clients,onDelete,onMarkPaid,onExportPDF}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:invoices.map(inv=>{const client=clients.find(c=>c._id===inv.client);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-center border-b py-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"font-bold",children:["Invoice #",inv._id.slice(-4)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded ".concat(inv.status==="Paid"?"bg-green-100 text-green-700":"bg-red-100 text-red-700"),children:inv.status})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:[client?client.name:"Unknown"," - $",inv.amount.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-xs text-gray-500",children:["Due: ",new Date(inv.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()]}),inv.description&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xs text-gray-600 mt-1",children:inv.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2 mt-2 md:mt-0",children:[inv.status==="Unpaid"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded",onClick:()=>onMarkPaid(inv._id),children:"Mark Paid"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded",onClick:()=>onDelete(inv._id),children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-gray-500 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded",onClick:()=>onExportPDF(inv),children:"Export PDF"})]})]},inv._id);})});};export default InvoiceList;
